sources.title: The Magnetic Telescope (1942)
sources.description: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-magnetic-telescope-1942/

metadata.Plot: An experimental "magnetic telescope" draws down a fireball from space. Despite warnings, the callous "professor" tries it again, this time on a full-fledged comet. Even Superman is unable to halt its mighty momentum. Is Metropolis doomed?
metadata.Writer: Jerry Siegel, Joe Shuster, Dan Gordon
metadata.Actors: Bud Collyer, Joan Alexander, Jackson Beck
